# Hello!

Firstly, I'm so glad you come here! 

Something about me: I'm a master's student in biostatistics at Columbia University, New York, expect to graduate on May 2024. I am interested in biomedical applications of data science and statistics. There are also my Key Projects at industries and academics. Also, I have been fortunate to win some Awards.
